Measure type: [475] Restriction on entry into free circulation
Measure components: Condition [B1] Presentation of a certificate/licence/document : Document [C] Action [29] Import/export allowed after control : ||Condition [B2] Presentation of a certificate/licence/document : Action [09] Import/export not allowed after control :
Conditions:
CD619: (Conditions) The import shall be subject to the presentation of a declaration of compliance with the information requested in Annex IV of Regulation (EU) No 10/2011 as modified by Regulation (EU) No 321/2011.
The import into EU of Polycarbonate infant feeding bottles produced using 2,2-bis(4-hydroxyphenyl)propane also known as Bisphenol A is prohibited.
